FuncDef: This command provisions the maintenance endpoint (MEP).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maintenance association end point identifier. Values-1 to 8191.
Specifies the maintenance domain (MD) index value. Values-1 to 4294967295.
Specifies the MA index value. Values-1 to 4294967295.
Specific to tunnel facility MEPs which means this option is only applicable to the lag>eth-cfm> context. Used to specify the outer vlan id of the tunnel. Values-1 to 4094.
